name: Yet Another Quote Database
short_description:
YAQD is your easy solution to store all your and your friends quotes in one nice database.

With all functions needed to manage your own quote DB like

 - Add quotes (duh..)
 - Delete quotes
 - Rate Quotes
 - List all quotes sorted by rating, date or person who submitted the quote
 - And much more coming soon!
summary: Yet Another Quote Database, A easy way to store your awesome quotes
